title: Ye First Pentas
body:
Hi guys,

I just thought about it, and it would have been really nice to know what kind of champs are the most popular. But the the thought hit me. What would be better than to know someone's first PENTAKILL! So please guys, vote on the poll below :D THANKS! (Oh, and if you don't mind, also tell me which champion it was in the comment section below)

IMPORTANT: Im sorry for forgetting to put Mage in the vote. Just put it as an assassin if you would like.

replies.body:
I honestly don't remember the first, though I think it was like WarWick or Ashe or something.
However I remember the best :O! Once upon a time:
"Be me, soloing Bazza as Aatrox, when suddenly a wild enemy team appears.
An all ADC team flies out in all directions, consisting of a Draven, Ashe, Graves, Lucian and Quinn.
Ashe shot me in the face with her ult, causing a good second stun, while tanking Bazza and taking fire from all 5 enemies.
So then, the stun wore off. I pounced my Q right on Ashe's head, but she did a (super glitchy) mid-knock-up-flash-tele-super-dive-escape!
NEXT THING I KNOW! All the enemies have run away, so I returned to killing Bazza solo style.
After slaying the beast, I had run from his pit up towards the (used to be Wraith den) on the (used to be purple) side of the map.
WHEN SUDDENLY! ALL 5 ENEMIES JUMPED OUT IN A VIOLENT ATTEMPT TO MAIM AND DISTORT MY FACE!
So with one swift motion, I ulted that s**t, with some Q an some E an some bloodprice, suddenly an enemy has been slayne
THEN SUDDENLY! DOUBLE KILL! THEN TRIPLE KILL! THEN QUADRA KILL! THEN SUDDENLY GRAVES TRIED TO FLASH-DASH AWAY!
BUT I Q HIM!
THE ALL-CHAT GOES WILD!
AND
PENTA-KIRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR
# {{champion:266}} folyfe

My first was with Jungle {{champion:121}}. Was a very fun moment :)

Actually now I think of it all of my Pentas have been from Jungle games :-0
I used Lucian. :) got it a few days ago....

First penta was a 1 V 5 as top lane Swain in URF. I had 3 on me then 2 were a bit late but that was an awesome Penta because I had no help. I have gotten many quadra's as full tank Sion and Dr. Mundo however yet the last kill is stolen or is on the other side of the map.
does bots count? cuz i havent gotten a penta in normals or ranked ;-; quadra kills 4 dayz wit teh penta ks'd
Well. i voted assasin but i was playing poppy and shes a tank but i built her assasin so yea
Orianna sometime last year. Shockwave Distortion was an instant Triple. And then I chaed one down and then enemy Lee tried to 1v1 me and I rekt him. I was pretty fed lol

First one I got was during Ascension. I was playing bursty Diana (I can call her an assassin with the right build, I think). Note, I was not the ascended. The enemy was ascended.
So I think it still counts.
I may have stolen two of those kills, but whatever :D

you forgot mage :/
first penta with yi and not proud of it
i think my second and third penta were also with yi then i got one with fiddle

so many penta's stolen tho :(
{{champion:22}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:55}}  all quads with stolen penta.
still shout-out to my teammates for making it all possible.
Actually same. i nearly got a penta with qiunn just last week, but then morg snared me under turret, and i died and someone else got the ace ;(

First penta was with Yi on Aram and both things mean it doesn't count, my summoners rift penta was with AP Ezreal... So is that adc or assassin or what?
Seeming there is no Mage I'll just class him as AP assassin

My first ever penta was actually on Mordekaiser quite a number of years ago. I was completely fed and I managed to ult their ADC which made me pretty much untouchable.
Huehuehuehue.
